short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirect to google custom search engine for islamQA

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IslamQA Search Plugin for chrome is a simple chrome extension to help you quickly and easily search for answers to your questions on Islamqa.info via google's site search. It saves you some time setting up the google site search query. Just click the extension's browser icon, type your question or search query and be directed to results from Islamqa.info in google's site search.
